TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You have an IQ a bit higher than the #1 Dentist Recommended Leading Brand of Toothpaste.

I wish for a non-destructive Kerbal.

Granted. Here's one we call.... oh wait we don't have one.

I wish......... for something good.

Granted, but you're so shocked from actually getting what you want that you get a heart attack and die.

I wish for an easy system to keep save files up to date while playing both on my stationary and my laptop.

Granted. You now spend all your time playing KSP and flunk out of school/lose your job.

(Seriously though, look into dropbox and symbolic links, pm me if you need help.)

I wish it wasn't so hot and humid today.

Granted, now that your save files got a date together they no longer care about you and go on another network leaving you without any saves & files.

I wish i could be in the mood to play with the mud.

Granted, but you're with Sun.

I wish for a sandwich made out of kerbals.

Granted, it's poisonous.

I wish for a burger.

Granted. You get a burger-burglar. He takes your wallet and all your valuables.

I wish for a zombie.

Granted. You're a zombie! and you suffer from excruciating pains because your own flesh is rotting.

I wish I had a zombie repellent, just in case.

Granted. The Zombo Overlord, who is the only zombie without a rotten brain, decides to send zombies to your house regardless of the spooky ghost noises coming out of the wall.

The zombie repellent spray was actually ghost spray, but it repels zombies.

I wish for circumnavigating planes.

Granted. You can only book flights through zombo.com.

I wish more sites were as entertaining as zombo.com.

Granted. They deny service and just make funny welcome pages.

I wish for green greens.

Granted, but suddenly greens become purple.

I wish Comcast didn't try to charge me $200+ for BBCAmerica when they said they'd only charge me $130.

Granted. They try to charge $300+.

I wish all communications companies would grow a conscience.

Granted. You don't have BBC at all.

Can I have a pet kerbal?

Granted. He owns all the space programs and runs off with a interstellar ship to Kerbol.

I wish for another dog.

Granted, but it's a Chihuahua.

I wish I could fly.

Granted, but i misheard you and thought you said be independent of Earths rotation and you slam a building.

I still wish somebody would update PlatinumSpore(I don't vexx32 is gonna update it).

Granted. Your computer spontaneously turns into a platinum replica (nonfunctioning), upon installing the new version of PlatinumSpore. You receive complementary Spore merchandise, which is also platinum. You turn into platinum.

I wish I could flee.

Granted, but now the cops are after you.

I wish I could tell colours apart.

Granted. You are now racist, and sent to prison for doing such a horrible thing.

I wish for 2 ices cream.

Granted. Wait, where are your eyeballs?

I wish for a dimension-jumper.

Granted. The slider brings you into a dimension where the ground of all the planets are covered in a foot of Legos. Oh, I should mention you are barefoot. And don't have arms.

I wish for pizza.

Granted, but it runs away.

I wish for this wish to be corrupted!

Granted: This wish has cost you 49.99$.

I wish to wish this wish for free.
